Rwanda.title: Rwanda
Rwanda.byline: Rwanda is a relatively stable East African country, and easily accessible from Kenya and Uganda.

Rwaihamba.title: Rwaihamba
Rwaihamba.byline: Rwaihamba is a village in Western Uganda, 40 km from Fort Portal.

Rwamagana.title: Rwamagana
Rwamagana.byline: Rwamagana is the capital of the Rwamagana District and Rwanda's Eastern Province.
